answers.text:
Hi David,  
First of all congratulations! That is very exciting and it seems that other local governments are starting to celebrate their 100 year anniversary as council manager governments as well. Here is a blog post that a member wrote earlier this year about the history of their town's 100 years. You could consider posting a similar blog on the Knowledge Network in commemoration of this anniversary as well as putting out a press release for the community.  http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/2110/100_Years_of_CouncilManager_Stewardship 
Best,  
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern  
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: David Kraus
text:
We are approaching the 100 year anniversary of the council manager form of government here in Glencoe, IL. Was wondering if there were any model proclamations or examples of some that others have used for this occasion.
Much Thanks!
Dave Kraus
title: 100 Years of Council Manager Form of Government
